Name: Mauled
About the game: EARLY ACCESS. Mauled is a Free To Play, Third Person Shooter, CO-OP online, with procedural generated levels, infinite hordes of fierces creatures and many weapons to buy in citadels. 1-4 player CO-OP mode: collab with other players to survive the hordes. The more united you are, the more chance you have of moving on. Use traps, powerups and more to fight. Procedurally levels: each arena will procedurally generate its own environment, so every game will be different than before. Citadels and merchants: each arena have a citadel. In the citadel you can buy your arsenal from merchants. Increasingly strong enemies: The creatures will be much tougher and much more dangerous horde after horde, so you'll need to be well equipped ahead of time and upgrade your weaponry.
